column5: So, I'm sitting here with my 'agenda' scheduling stuff, including dates of openers and when and where to go fishing.  The problem is, do I trust that the new regs will not be out until mid summer and schedule using the 2006 openers, or keep waiting until the 2007 regs come out?  How does Tuxbury's do it, they have a calendar for the whole year out already.  Thoughts, Entropy
Hmmm...I'd continue to use the 06 regs for planning.  Knowing the speed of the govt, we'll be using them all year anyways.
